title: The Best of Pokémon Adventures: Red
description: The greatest Pokémon trainer of all time returns!Red's back and he's on a mission to catch all the Pokémon. But he's finding out there are rivals around every corner. There's Misty, Green, and Blue--they're all searching for Pokémon too. And don't forget about the mysterious Team Rocket! Suddenly, Pokémon are more popular than ever before. Everyone, it seems, wants to get their hands on Mew, Poliwhirl, Bulbasaur and, of course, the irrepressible electric mouse--Pikachu!!Cover & Graphic Design/Izumi Hirayama
author: Hidenori Kusaka
